Document:
# Argocytes
A distant relatives of Xenos, Argocytes, are known throughout the sector for their ability to eat and digest almost anything from your friendly neighbor to reinforced plastitanium vault walls. Just like Xenos this species is well acclimated to the most hostile environments imaginable: neither the vacuum of space nor the extreme heat and pressure of a planet consumed by plasma fire can kill those creatures.
The species has two clearly defined morphotypes (that we know of): "workers" and "warriors".
Has fluorosulfuric acid for blood.
# Known variants ## "Slurva"
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health pool:[/color][/bold] 20 - [bold][color=#a4885c]Run (walk) speed:[/color][/bold] 4 m/s (3 m/s)[bold][color=#a4885c]*[/color][/bold] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage (type):[/color][/bold] [color=red]Blunt[/color] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistances:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] None
A pathetic creature, incapable of doing much. Yet. Better to kill it now, before it has a chance to mature. Underdeveloped teeth and jaws don't allow slurvas to consume any materials harder than bones.
[bold][color=#a4885c]*[/color][/bold] - [italic]an average healthy unburdened human being's run (walk) speed is 4.5 m/s (2.5 m/s).[/italic]
## "Barrier"
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health pool:[/color][/bold] 30 - [bold][color=#a4885c]Run (walk) speed:[/color][/bold] 3.5 m/s (3 m/s) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage (type):[/color][/bold] [color=red]Blunt[/color] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistances:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] None
One of the two possible stages of slurva's life cycle. Still not capable of consuming anything harder than bones.
## "Skitter"
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health pool:[/color][/bold] 30 - [bold][color=#a4885c]Run (walk) speed:[/color][/bold] 4 m/s (3 m/s) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage (type):[/color][/bold] [color=red]Slash[/color] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistances:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] None
Slightly more mature and grown barrier. Still not capable of consuming anything harder than bones.
## "Swiper"
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health pool:[/color][/bold] 50 - [bold][color=#a4885c]Run (walk) speed:[/color][/bold] 5 m/s (3 m/s) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage (type):[/color][/bold] [color=red]Slash[/color] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistances:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] None
By this point jaws, teeth, and digestive tract of young argocyte are developed enough for it to be able to consume and digest soft metals.

- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health pool:[/color][/bold] 500 - [bold][color=#a4885c]Run (walk) speed:[/color][/bold] 3.5 m/s (3 m/s) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage (type):[/color][/bold] [color=red]Blunt[/color] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistances:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] None
# Missions targets ## Elimination
Eliminate large and dangerous creature - [color=#a4885c]leviathing[/color] within given time constraints to earn a monetary reward.
## Destruction
Destroy a certain amount of [color=#a4885c]argocyte eggs[/color] within given time constraints to earn a monetary reward.
